trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control is a range that is created when a non-repeating schema element is mapped onto a cell.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件是在非重复架构元素映射到单元格上时创建的范围。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control only supports binding to a single data field (simple data binding).
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件仅支持绑定到单个数据字段 （简单数据绑定）。

trans-unit.source: A non-repeating schema element is one in which the `maxOccurs` attribute equals one.
trans-unit.target: 非重复架构元素是一个在其中`maxOccurs`属性等于一。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: Activates a single cell <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 激活单个单元格 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: To select a range of cells, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要选择的一个单元范围，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The comment text.
trans-unit.target: 注释文本。

trans-unit.source: Adds a comment to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 向 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件添加注释。

trans-unit.source: The comment that was added to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 添加到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的注释。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.AddComment%2A> method to add a comment to an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`, and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Comment%2A> property to alter the comment text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.AddComment%2A>方法添加到注释<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Comment%2A>属性更改注释文本。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether text is automatically indented when the text alignment in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control is set to equal distribution either horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中的文本对齐方式设置为水平或垂直平均分布时，文本是否自动缩进。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if text is automatically indented when the text alignment in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control is set to equal distribution either horizontally or vertically; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中的文本对齐方式设置为在水平或垂直方向均匀分布时文本会自动缩进，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To set text alignment to equal distribution, you can set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.VerticalAlignment%2A> property to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlVAlign.xlVAlignDistributed> when the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlOrientation.xlVertical>, and you can set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHAlign.xlHAlignDistributed> when the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlOrientation.xlHorizontal>.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置文本对齐方式为均匀分布，可以设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.VerticalAlignment%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlVAlign.xlVAlignDistributed>时的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.Orientation%2A>属性是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlOrientation.xlVertical>，还可以设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.HorizontalAlignment%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHAlign.xlHAlignDistributed>时的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.Orientation%2A>属性是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlOrientation.xlHorizontal>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the range reference of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的范围引用。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the range reference of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control in R1C1-style or A1-style notation.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，以 R1C1 样式或 A1 样式表示法表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的范围引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Address%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Address%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: `true` to return the row as an absolute reference; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: `true` 为的绝对引用; 返回行否则为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: `true` to return the column as an absolute reference; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要为的绝对引用; 返回的列否则为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlReferenceStyle> values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlReferenceStyle> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: `true` to return an external reference; `false` to return a local reference.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要返回的外部引用;`false`返回的本地引用。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> that defines the starting point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> ，它定义的起始点。

trans-unit.source: If `RowAbsolute` and `ColumnAbsolute` are `false`, and `ReferenceStyle` is <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlReferenceStyle.xlR1C1>, you must include a starting point for the relative reference.
trans-unit.target: 如果`RowAbsolute`和`ColumnAbsolute`是`false`，和`ReferenceStyle`是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlReferenceStyle.xlR1C1>，必须包含一个起始点，相对的引用。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Address%2A> without specifying any parameters, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Address%2A> will get an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange_AddressType> object that is part of the Office development tools in Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Address%2A>而不指定任何参数，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Address%2A>将获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange_AddressType>对象属于的 Office 开发工具在 Visual Studio 基础结构和不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Address%2A> property to display the range location of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Address%2A>属性显示的范围位置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: The example uses different combinations of the `ReferenceStyle`, `RowAbsolute`, `ColumnAbsolute` and `RelativeTo` parameters to display the range location in four different formats.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用的不同组合`ReferenceStyle`， `RowAbsolute`，`ColumnAbsolute`和`RelativeTo`参数以四种不同格式显示范围位置。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: If `CustomerLastNameCell` is at cell A2, the example will display the address strings "$A$2", "$A2", "R2C2", and "R[-1]C[-1]".
trans-unit.target: 如果`CustomerLastNameCell`是单元格 A2，该示例将显示的地址字符串"$A$ 2"，"$A2"、"R2C2"和"R [-1] C [-1]"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the range reference of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control in the language of the user.
trans-unit.target: 以用户的语言获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的范围引用。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the range reference of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control in the language of the user and in R1C1-style or A1-style notation.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，以用户的语言以及 R1C1 样式或 A1 样式表示法表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的范围引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.AddressLocal%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.AddressLocal%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: `true` to return the row as an absolute reference; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: `true` 为的绝对引用; 返回行否则为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: `true` to return the column as an absolute reference; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要为的绝对引用; 返回的列否则为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlReferenceStyle> values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlReferenceStyle> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: `true` to return an external reference; `false` to return a local reference.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要返回的外部引用;`false`返回的本地引用。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> that defines the starting point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> ，它定义的起始点。

trans-unit.source: If `RowAbsolute` and `ColumnAbsolute` are `false`, and `ReferenceStyle` is <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlReferenceStyle.xlR1C1>, you must include a starting point for the relative reference.
trans-unit.target: 如果`RowAbsolute`和`ColumnAbsolute`是`false`，和`ReferenceStyle`是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlReferenceStyle.xlR1C1>，必须包含一个起始点，相对的引用。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.AddressLocal%2A> without specifying any parameters, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.AddressLocal%2A> will get an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange_AddressLocalType> object that is part of the Office development tools in Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.AddressLocal%2A>而不指定任何参数，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.AddressLocal%2A>将获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange_AddressLocalType>对象属于的 Office 开发工具在 Visual Studio 基础结构和不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.AddressLocal%2A> property to display the range location of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.AddressLocal%2A>属性显示的范围位置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: The example uses different combinations of the `ReferenceStyle`, `RowAbsolute`, `ColumnAbsolute` and `RelativeTo` parameters to display the range location in four different formats.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用的不同组合`ReferenceStyle`， `RowAbsolute`，`ColumnAbsolute`和`RelativeTo`参数以四种不同格式显示范围位置。

trans-unit.source: The location strings will be localized according to the language of the system it is run on.
trans-unit.target: 位置字符串将根据系统运行的语言进行本地化。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: If the example is run on a system using German language support and `CustomerLastNameCell` is at cell A2, the example will display the address strings "$A$2", "$A2", "Z2S2", and "Z[-1]S[-1]".
trans-unit.target: 如果使用德语语言支持的系统上运行该示例和`CustomerLastNameCell`是单元格 A2，该示例将显示的地址字符串"$A$ 2"，"$A2"、"Z2S2"和"Z-[1] S [-1]"。

trans-unit.source: Performs a writeback operation for all edited cells in an XML mapped range based on an OLAP data source.
trans-unit.target: 基于 OLAP 数据源为 XML 映射范围内的所有已编辑单元格执行写回操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.AllocateChanges%2A> method will execute an UPDATE CUBE statement for all changes made in the XML mapped range since the last apply changes operation was committed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.AllocateChanges%2A>方法将执行 UPDATE CUBE 语句，在 XML 中进行的所有更改映射范围，因为最后一个应用的更改操作已提交。

trans-unit.source: This method generates a run-time error if it is executed on a range based on a non-OLAP data source.
trans-unit.target: 如果范围基于非 OLAP 数据源上执行，则此方法会生成运行时错误。

trans-unit.source: This method appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this method cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in an Excel 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于 Excel 2007 项目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control can be edited on a protected worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以在受保护的工作表上编辑 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control can be edited on a protected worksheet; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以在受保护的工作表上编辑 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" /> that represents the Microsoft Office Excel application.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示 Microsoft Office Excel 应用程序的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" /> that represents the Excel application.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" />，表示 Excel 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Application%2A> property to tile all open application windows.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Application%2A>平铺所有打开的应用程序窗口的属性。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: The string to complete.
trans-unit.target: 要完成的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets an AutoComplete match from the list.
trans-unit.target: 从列表中获取一个 AutoComplete 匹配。

trans-unit.source: An AutoComplete match from the list.
trans-unit.target: 列表中的 AutoComplete 匹配项。

trans-unit.source: If there is no AutoComplete match or if more than one entry in the list matches the string to complete, this method returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有自动完成匹配项，或者在列表中的多个条目与匹配要完成的字符串，此方法将返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: This method works even if the AutoComplete feature is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 此方法适用即使记忆式键入功能被禁用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example enters the string "Smith" into cell B1, and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.AutoComplete%2A> method to find an AutoComplete match for the string "Smi".
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例 B1，单元格中输入字符串"Smith"，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.AutoComplete%2A>方法来查找字符串"Smi"的自动完成匹配项。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: The AutoComplete match will be found if `CustomerLastNameCell` is in cell B2.
trans-unit.target: 如果将找到记忆式键入匹配`CustomerLastNameCell`位于单元格 B2。

trans-unit.source: The offset of the field on which you want to base the filter (from the left of the list; the leftmost field is field 1 (one)).
trans-unit.target: 要使筛选器基于的字段的偏移量（从列表的左边算起；最左边的字段为字段 1（一））。

trans-unit.source: The criteria (a string; for example, "101").
trans-unit.target: 条件（一个字符串；例如“101”）。

trans-unit.source: Use "=" to find blank fields, or use "<>" to find nonblank fields.
trans-unit.target: 使用“=”查找空白字段，或使用“<>”查找非空白字段。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the criteria is <see langword="All" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则条件为 <see langword="All" />。

trans-unit.source: If <c>Operator</c> is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAutoFilterOperator.xlTop10Items" />, <c>Criteria1</c> specifies the number of items (for example, "10").
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Operator</c> 为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAutoFilterOperator.xlTop10Items" />，则 <c>Criteria1</c> 指定项数（如“10”）。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAutoFilterOperator" /> constants:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAutoFilterOperator" /> 常量之一：

trans-unit.source: Use <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAutoFilterOperator.xlAnd" /> and <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAutoFilterOperator.xlOr" /> with <c>Criteria1</c> and <c>Criteria2</c> to construct compound criteria.
trans-unit.target: 在 <c>Criteria1</c> 和 <c>Criteria2</c> 中使用 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAutoFilterOperator.xlAnd" /> 和 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAutoFilterOperator.xlOr" /> 来构造复合条件。

trans-unit.source: The second criteria (a string).
trans-unit.target: 第二个条件（字符串）。

trans-unit.source: Used with <c>Criteria1</c> and <c>Operator</c> to construct compound criteria.
trans-unit.target: 与 <c>Criteria1</c> 和 <c>Operator</c> 一起用于构造复合条件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the AutoFilter drop-down arrow for the filtered field; <see langword="false" /> to hide the AutoFilter drop-down arrow for the filtered field.
trans-unit.target: 如果对所筛选字段显示自动筛选下拉箭头，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果对所筛选字段隐藏自动筛选下拉箭头，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Filters a list using the AutoFilter.
trans-unit.target: 使用“自动筛选”筛选列表。

trans-unit.source: If you omit all the arguments, this method simply toggles the display of the AutoFilter drop-down arrows in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略的自变量，则此方法只需切换的中的自动筛选下拉箭头显示<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Automatically creates an outline for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 自动为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件创建大纲。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control is a single cell, Microsoft Office Excel creates an outline for the entire sheet.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件为单个单元格，则 Microsoft Office Excel 创建概述整张工作表。

trans-unit.source: The new outline replaces any existing outline.
trans-unit.target: 新的大纲替换任何现有的大纲。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control is double-clicked, before the default double-click action.
trans-unit.target: 在双击 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件时，但在默认的双击操作之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.BeforeDoubleClick> event that cancels the double-click action in an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.BeforeDoubleClick>取消双击操作中的事件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: The event handler informs the user that double-clicking is not allowed for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>, and then sets the `Cancel` parameter of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.DocEvents_BeforeDoubleClickEventHandler> event handler to `true` so that Microsoft Office Excel cancels the double-click action.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序会通知用户，双击不允许这些<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>，然后将设置`Cancel`参数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.DocEvents_BeforeDoubleClickEventHandler>事件处理程序`true`，以便 Microsoft Office Excel 取消双击操作。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control is right-clicked, before the default right-click action.
trans-unit.target: 在右击 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件时，但在默认的右击操作之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.BeforeRightClick> event that cancels the right-click action in an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.BeforeRightClick>取消右键单击操作中的事件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: The event handler informs the user that right-clicking is not allowed for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>, and then sets the `Cancel` parameter of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.DocEvents_BeforeRightClickEventHandler> event handler to `true` so that Microsoft Office Excel cancels the right-click action.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序会通知用户，右键单击不允许这些<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>，然后将设置`Cancel`参数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.DocEvents_BeforeRightClickEventHandler>事件处理程序`true`，以便 Microsoft Office Excel 取消右键单击操作。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: The line style for the border.
trans-unit.target: 边框的线型。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLineStyle" /> values:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLineStyle" /> 值之一：

trans-unit.source: The border weight.
trans-unit.target: 边框的粗细。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlBorderWeight" /> constants:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlBorderWeight" /> 常量之一：

trans-unit.source: The border color, as an index into the current color palette or as an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColorIndex" /> constant.
trans-unit.target: 边框颜色（作为访问当前调色板的索引或作为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColorIndex" /> 常数）。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColorIndex" /> constants:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColorIndex" /> 常量之一：

trans-unit.source: The border color, as an RGB value.
trans-unit.target: 边框颜色，采用 RGB 值的形式。

trans-unit.source: The theme color, as an index into the current color theme or as an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlThemeColor" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 主题颜色（作为访问当前颜色主题的索引或作为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlThemeColor" /> 值）。

trans-unit.source: Adds a border to a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control and sets the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Border.Color" />, <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Border.LineStyle" />, and <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Border.Weight" /> properties for the new border.
trans-unit.target: 向 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件添加一个边框，并设置新边框的 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Border.Color" />、<see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Border.LineStyle" /> 和 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Border.Weight" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: You must specify either `ColorIndex` or `Color`, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 你必须指定`ColorIndex`或`Color`，但不是两者。

trans-unit.source: You can specify either `LineStyle` or `Weight`, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定`LineStyle`或`Weight`，但不是两者。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify either argument, Microsoft Office Excel uses the default line style and weight.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定两个参数，Microsoft Office Excel 将使用默认线条样式和权重。

trans-unit.source: This method outlines the entire range without filling it in.
trans-unit.target: 此方法而不填充概述的整个范围。

trans-unit.source: To set the borders of all the cells, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders.Color%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders.LineStyle%2A>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders.Weight%2A> properties for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置的所有单元格的边框，必须设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders.Color%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders.LineStyle%2A>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders.Weight%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders>集合。

trans-unit.source: To clear the border, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders.LineStyle%2A> property to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLineStyle.xlLineStyleNone> for all the cells in the range.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除边框，必须设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders.LineStyle%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLineStyle.xlLineStyleNone>区域中的所有单元格。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders" /> collection that represents the borders of an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders" /> 集合，该集合表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的边框。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders" /> collection that represents the borders of an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders" /> 集合，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的边框。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Borders%2A> property to draw double lines for the border of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>, and it uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Interior%2A> property to color the interior of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> green.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Borders%2A>属性绘制的边框的双线<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>，并使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Interior%2A>属性进行着色的内部<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>绿色。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the value of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 计算 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Calculate%2A> method to calculate the value of the formula in the `EmployeeSeniorityCell`<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control on `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Calculate%2A>方法计算的值中的公式`EmployeeSeniorityCell`<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控制上`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must add an XML map to your workbook based on the Employee XML schema and map the schema elements from this XML map to cells on a worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须将 XML 映射添加到你的工作簿基于员工 XML 架构，并将映射从此 XML 映射到工作表上的单元格的架构元素。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the schema from [Walkthrough: Binding Content Controls to Custom XML Parts](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts.md) and modify it by adding a seniority element of type integer to the employee element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以使用从架构[演练： 将内容控件绑定到自定义 XML 部件](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts.md)和修改通过将整数类型的高低元素添加到员工元素。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you populate the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control from an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，填充<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>从 XML 文件的控件。

trans-unit.source: This example hard-codes the value of the control for simplicity.
trans-unit.target: 此示例硬编码为简单起见控件的值。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the value in each item in the range in row-major order.
trans-unit.target: 在某个范围内，按行优先的顺序计算每项的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.CalculateRowMajorOrder%2A> method calculates the specified range cell by cell, from its top-left corner to its bottom-right corner in row-major order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.CalculateRowMajorOrder%2A>方法计算指定的范围逐单元格，从其左上角到按行优先顺序其右下角。

trans-unit.source: This is the same process that is used by Excel 2000 and earlier versions to calculate a range.
trans-unit.target: 这是通过 Excel 2000 和更早版本中用于计算一系列的相同过程。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the cells in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 控件中单元格的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the cells in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 控件中单元格的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Cells%2A> property to display the cell location of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Cells%2A>属性显示的单元格位置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when something changes in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中发生更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改控制。

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control changes during a recalculation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件不会发生时<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控制重新计算引起的更改。

trans-unit.source: The following code demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Change> event that displays the address of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> that changed.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Change>显示的地址的事件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>更改。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Characters" /> object that represents a range of characters within the text of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Characters" /> 对象，该对象表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件文本中某一范围的字符。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Characters" /> object that represents a range of characters within the text of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Characters" /> 对象，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件文本中某一范围的字符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Characters%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Characters%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The first character to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的第一个字符。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is either 1 or omitted, this property returns a range of characters starting with the first character.
trans-unit.target: 如果此参数为 1 或被省略，则此属性将返回一系列字符开头的第一个字符。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的字符数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, this property returns the remainder of the string (everything after the `Start` character).
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则此属性返回字符串的其余部分 (之后的所有内容`Start`字符)。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Characters%2A> without specifying any parameters, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Characters%2A> will get an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange_CharactersType> object that is part of Office development tools in Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Characters%2A>而不指定任何参数，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Characters%2A>将获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange_CharactersType>对象属于的 Office 开发工具在 Visual Studio 基础结构和不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Characters?displayProperty=fullName> object to format characters within a text string.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Characters?displayProperty=fullName>到内的文本字符串的格式字符的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Characters?displayProperty=fullName> object is not a collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Characters?displayProperty=fullName>对象不是一个集合。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Characters%2A> property to apply bold formatting to the first character in the text of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Characters%2A>属性，将应用粗体格式的文本中的第一个字符<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the file name of the custom dictionary to be examined if the word is not found in the main dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 指示在主字典中找不到该单词时要检查的自定义字典的文件名。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the currently specified dictionary is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用当前指定的字典。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Microsoft Office Excel ignore words that are all uppercase; <see langword="false" /> to have Excel check words that are all uppercase.
trans-unit.target: 如果让 Microsoft Office Excel 忽略全大写的单词，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果让 Excel 检查全大写的单词，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the current setting is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用当前设置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Excel display a list of suggested alternate spellings when an incorrect spelling is found; <see langword="false" /> to have Excel pause while you input the correct spelling.
trans-unit.target: 如果让 Excel 在找到错误拼写时显示建议的替换拼写的列表，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果让 Excel 在您输入正确的拼写时暂停，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the current setting is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用当前设置。

trans-unit.source: The language of the dictionary being used.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的字典的语言。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoLanguageID" /> values used by the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Core.LanguageSettings.LanguageID(Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoAppLanguageID)" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoLanguageID" /> 属性使用的 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Core.LanguageSettings.LanguageID(Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoAppLanguageID)" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Checks the spelling of text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 检查 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中文本的拼写。

trans-unit.source: This method has no return value; Excel displays the **Spelling** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此方法具有无返回值。Excel 显示**拼写**对话框。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.CheckSpelling%2A> method to check the spelling of text in an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.CheckSpelling%2A>方法中的文本进行拼写检查<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Clears the entire <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 清除整个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: Clears all cell comments from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中清除所有单元格注释。

trans-unit.source: Clears the formulas from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中清除公式。

trans-unit.source: Clears the formatting of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 清除 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的格式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.BorderAround%2A> method to apply a thick border around an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.BorderAround%2A>方法以应用粗边框<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: The example then prompts the user to clear the border by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.ClearFormats%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该示例提示用户通过清除边框<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.ClearFormats%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Removes all hyperlinks from the specified range.
trans-unit.target: 从指定范围移除所有超链接。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.ClearHyperlinks%2A> method on the specified range is equivalent to using the **Clear Hyperlinks** command from the **Clear** drop-down list in the **Editing** group of the **Home** tab in Excel.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.ClearHyperlinks%2A>上指定的范围的方法相当于使用**清除超链接**命令**清除**下拉列表中的**编辑**组**主页**在 Excel 中的选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Only hyperlinks will be removed; all other cell content, such as text and formatting will be unaffected.
trans-unit.target: 将删除仅超链接;所有其他单元格内容，例如文本和格式设置不会影响。

trans-unit.source: This property appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此属性将出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this property cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Clears notes and sound notes from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中清除说明和声音说明。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.NoteText%2A> method to add a note to an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>, and then prompts the user to remove the note by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.ClearNotes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.NoteText%2A>方法添加到注释<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>，然后会提示用户通过移除注意<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.ClearNotes%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Clears the outline for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 清除 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的大纲。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of the column in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中的列号。

trans-unit.source: The number of the column in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中的列号。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> corresponds to only one cell, this property always returns 1.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>仅对应于一个单元格，此属性始终返回 1。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Column%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Row%2A> properties to display the column and row numbers of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Column%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Row%2A>属性显示的列和行号<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: A single cell to compare to the specified range.
trans-unit.target: 一个要与指定的范围进行比较的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents all the cells whose contents are different from the comparison cell in each column.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，它表示每一列中其内容与比较单元格不同的所有单元格。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents all the cells whose contents are different from the comparison cell in each column.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，表示内容与每一列中的比较单元格不同的所有单元格。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the column in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中的列宽。

trans-unit.source: The width of the column in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中的列宽。

trans-unit.source: One unit of column width is equal to the width of one character in the Normal style.
trans-unit.target: 一个单元的列宽度等于正文样式中的一个字符的宽度。

trans-unit.source: For proportional fonts, the width of the character 0 (zero) is used.
trans-unit.target: 对于非等宽字体使用的字符 0 （零） 的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Width%2A> property to return the width of a column in points.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Width%2A>属性以磅为单位返回列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.ColumnWidth%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.RowHeight%2A> properties to display the width and height of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.ColumnWidth%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.RowHeight%2A>要显示的宽度和高度属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Comment" /> that represents the comment associated with the cell in the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Comment" />，它表示与 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的左上角中的单元格相关联的注释。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Comment" /> that represents the comment associated with the cell in the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Comment" />，表示与 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的左上角中的单元格相关联的注释。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.AddComment%2A> method to add a comment to an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>, and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Comment%2A> property to alter the comment text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.AddComment%2A>方法添加到注释<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Comment%2A>属性更改注释文本。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: The sources of the consolidation as an array of text reference strings in R1C1-style notation.
trans-unit.target: 合并源（作为以 R1C1 样式表示法表示的文本引用字符串的数组）。

trans-unit.source: The references must include the full path of sheets to be consolidated.
trans-unit.target: 引用必须包含要合并的工作表的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlConsolidationFunction" /> constants:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlConsolidationFunction" /> 常量之一：

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to consolidate data based on column titles in the top row of the consolidation ranges; <see langword="false" /> to consolidate data by position.
trans-unit.target: 如果基于合并范围内首行中的列标题合并数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果按位置合并数据，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to consolidate data based on row titles in the left column of the consolidation ranges; <see langword="false" /> to consolidate data by position.
trans-unit.target: 如果基于合并范围内左列中的行标题合并数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果按位置合并数据，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have the consolidation use worksheet links; <see langword="false" /> to have the consolidation copy the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果让合并功能使用工作表链接，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果让合并功能复制数据，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Consolidates data from multiple ranges on multiple worksheets into an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将多个工作表中的多个范围的数据合并到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Consolidate%2A> method to consolidate the values of cell A1 on `Sheet2` and cell A1 on `Sheet3` into an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> on `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Consolidate%2A>方法上整合 A1 单元格的值`Sheet2`和上的单元格 A1`Sheet3`到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>上`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: The example consolidates the values by adding the values together.
trans-unit.target: 该示例通过同时添加值合并这些值。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that `Sheet1` contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定`Sheet1`包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the new range to which the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control is copied.
trans-unit.target: 指定要将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件复制到其中的新范围。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Office Excel copies the range to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Microsoft Office Excel 将该范围复制到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control to the specified range or to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的内容复制到指定的范围或剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Copy%2A> method to copy an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> to the Clipboard, and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.PasteSpecial%2A> method to copy the range to a different <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Copy%2A>方法以复制<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>到剪贴板，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.PasteSpecial%2A>方法将该范围复制为另一种<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains two <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> controls named `CustomerFirstNameCell` and `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含两个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件名为`CustomerFirstNameCell`和`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: The recordset to copy into the range.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到范围中的记录集。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of records to copy onto the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到工作表上的最大记录数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, all the records in the recordset object are copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则复制记录集对象中的所有记录。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of fields to copy onto the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到工作表上的最大字段数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, all the fields in the recordset object are copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则复制记录集对象中的所有字段。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of an ADO or DAO recordset onto a worksheet, beginning at the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将 ADO 或 DAO 记录集的内容复制到工作表（从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件开始）。

trans-unit.source: If the recordset contains fields with OLE objects in them, this method fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果记录集包含与在其中的 OLE 对象的字段，此方法将失败。

trans-unit.source: Copying begins at the current row of the recordset.
trans-unit.target: 复制开始记录集的当前行。

trans-unit.source: After copying is completed, the EOF property of the recordset object is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 复制完成后，记录集对象的 EOF 属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the picture should be copied.
trans-unit.target: 指定复制图片的方法。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPictureAppearance" /> constants:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPictureAppearance" /> 常量之一：

trans-unit.source: The format of the picture.
trans-unit.target: 该图片的格式。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlCopyPictureFormat" /> constants:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlCopyPictureFormat" /> 常量之一：

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control to the Clipboard as a picture.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件作为图片复制到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.CopyPicture%2A> method to copy an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> to the Clipboard as a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.CopyPicture%2A>方法以复制<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>到剪贴板以位图格式。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of objects in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中的对象数。

trans-unit.source: The number of objects in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中的对象数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Count%2A> property to display the number of objects in an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Count%2A>属性来显示中的对象数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the number of times that the largest value in a range appears.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值表示在某一范围内最大值出现的次数。

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the number of times that the largest value in a range appears.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示在某一范围内最大值出现次数的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to create names by using labels in the top row.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过使用首行中的标签来创建名称，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to create names by using labels in the left column.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过使用左列中的标签来创建名称，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to create names by using labels in the bottom row.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过使用底端行中的标签来创建名称，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to create names by using labels in the right column.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过使用右列中的标签来创建名称，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates names in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control, based on text labels in the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 根据工作表中的文本标签在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中创建名称。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify one of `Top`, `Left`, `Bottom`, or `Right`, Microsoft Office Excel guesses the location of the text labels.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不指定其中一个`Top`， `Left`， `Bottom`，或`Right`，Microsoft Office Excel 猜出文本标签的位置。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the application in which this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control was created.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示在其中创建此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlCreator" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlCreator" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control was created in Microsoft Office Excel, this property returns the string XCEL, which is equivalent to the hexadecimal number 5843454C.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>在 Microsoft Office Excel 中创建控件，则此属性返回字符串接，这等同于十六进制数字 5843454c。

trans-unit.source: The current region is a range bounded by any combination of blank rows and blank columns.
trans-unit.target: 当前的区域是受空白的行和空白的列的任意组合的范围。

trans-unit.target: 应将对象粘贴到的范围。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the object is cut to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则将对象剪切到剪贴板。

trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的内容剪切到剪贴板，或者将它复制到指定的目标。

trans-unit.source: Can be the <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlRows" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlColumns" /> constant to have the data series entered in rows or columns, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 可以为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlRows" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlColumns" /> 常数以将数据系列分别输入行或列中。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the size and shape of the range is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用该范围的大小和形状。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDataSeriesType" /> constants:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDataSeriesType" /> 常量之一：

trans-unit.source: If the <c>Type</c> argument is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDataSeriesType.xlChronological" />, the <c>Date</c> argument indicates the step date unit.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Type</c> 参数为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDataSeriesType.xlChronological" />，则 <c>Date</c> 参数指示步长日期单位。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDataSeriesDate" /> constants:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDataSeriesDate" /> 常量之一：

trans-unit.source: The step value for the series.
trans-unit.target: 该系列的步长值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1 (one).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1（一）。

trans-unit.source: The stop value for the series.
trans-unit.target: 该系列的终止值。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Office Excel fills to the end of the range.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Microsoft Office Excel 会填充到该范围的末尾。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to create a linear trend or growth trend; <see langword="false" /> to create a standard data series.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建等差序列或等比序列，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果创建标准数据系列，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a data series in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中创建一个数据系列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that contains all the dependents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.

trans-unit.source: This can be a multiple selection (a union of <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> objects) if there is more than one dependent.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是多重选择 (的并集<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>对象) 如果存在多个依赖。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Dependents%2A> property only works on the active sheet and cannot trace remote references.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Dependents%2A>属性仅适用于活动工作表，不能跟踪远程引用。

trans-unit.target: 然后，该代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Dependents%2A>属性选择的依赖项`CustomerLastNameCell`，这是单元格 A1 和 A2。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised only when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control has focus, and then focus is transferred away from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control.
trans-unit.target: 将引发此事件仅当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件具有焦点，并且然后将焦点移远离<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the range containing all the direct dependents of an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.

trans-unit.target: 然后，该代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.DirectDependents%2A>属性选择的直接依赖<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>，即单元格 A1。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the range containing all the direct precedents of an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.

trans-unit.source: This property only works on the active sheet and cannot trace remote references.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于活动工作表，不能跟踪远程引用。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerAddress1Cell` with a corresponding schema element of type `int`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerAddress1Cell`类型的相应架构元素使用`int`。

trans-unit.source: Designates an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control to be recalculated when the next recalculation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 指定在下一次重新计算发生时要重新计算的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.Calculate%2A> method forces the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control to be recalculated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.Calculate%2A>方法强制<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件重新计算。

trans-unit.source: If the application is in manual calculation mode, using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Dirty%2A> method instructs Excel to identify the specified cell to be recalculated.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序用于手动计算模式中，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Dirty%2A>方法指示 Excel 标识指定的单元格重新计算。

trans-unit.source: If the application is in automatic calculation mode, using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Dirty%2A> method instructs Excel to perform a recalculation.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序是在自动计算模式下，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Dirty%2A>方法指示 Excel 执行重新计算。

trans-unit.source: Discards all changes in the edited cells of the Xml mapped range.
trans-unit.target: 放弃 XML 映射范围内已编辑单元格中的所有更改。

trans-unit.source: For a range based on an OLAP data source, this method removes all values and formulas entered in the cells, and then runs an update operation to retrieve the latest values from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 对于基于 OLAP 数据源的范围，此方法中删除所有值和公式的单元中输入，然后运行更新操作来从数据源检索的最新值。

trans-unit.source: It sets the data source value to NULL for all value cells that are edited, and also executes a ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement against the OLAP server.
trans-unit.target: 它将所有值单元格的编辑，并还执行 ROLLBACK TRANSACTION 语句针对的 OLAP 服务器的数据源值都设置为 NULL。

trans-unit.source: For ranges based on non-OLAP data sources, this method simply clears all edited cells.
trans-unit.target: 对于基于非 OLAP 数据源的范围，此方法只是清除所有编辑过的单元格。

trans-unit.source: This method appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this method cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is used in an Excel 2007 project.

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，表示包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的区域末尾的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.End%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.End%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDirection> values that indicates the direction in which to find the last cell.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDirection>值，该值指示在其中查找最后一个单元格的方向。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.End%2A> without specifying any parameters, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.End%2A> will get an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange_EndType> object that is part of the Office development tools in Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.End%2A>而不指定任何参数，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.End%2A>将获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange_EndType>对象属于的 Office 开发工具在 Visual Studio 基础结构和不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: This property is equivalent to pressing END+UP ARROW, END+DOWN ARROW, END+LEFT ARROW, or END+RIGHT ARROW.
trans-unit.target: 此属性等效于按结束 + 向上键、 结束 + 向下箭头、 结束 + 向左键或结束 + 向右键。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.End%2A> property to select the cell at the end of the region that contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将插入到文本格式的数字<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Errors%2A>属性来确定是否以文本形式写入数。
