trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatType" /> values that specifies whether to save the workbook in PDF or XPS format.
trans-unit.target: 其中一个 <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatType" /> 值，该值指定是否要将工作簿保存为 PDF 或 XPS 格式。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the file name of the file to be saved.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含要保存的文件的文件名。

trans-unit.source: You can include a full path, or Excel saves the file in the current folder.
trans-unit.target: 可包括完整路径，或者 Excel 会将文件保存到当前文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatQuality" /> values that specifies the quality of the exported file.
trans-unit.target: 其中一个 <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatQuality" /> 值，该值指定导出文件的质量。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include the document properties; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要包括文档属性，请使用 <see langword="true" />；否则使用 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore any print areas set when exporting; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要在导出时忽略任何打印区域设置，请使用 <see langword="true" />；否则使用 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of the page at which to start exporting.
trans-unit.target: 要从其处开始导出的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, exporting starts at the first page.
trans-unit.target: 若忽略此参数，则从第一页开始导出。

trans-unit.source: The number of the last page to export.
trans-unit.target: 要导出的最后一页的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, exporting ends with the last page.
trans-unit.target: 若忽略此参数，则导出至最后一页。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the file in the viewer after it is published; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要在发布文件后在查看器中显示该文件，则使用 <see langword="true" />；否则使用 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to an implementation of the <see langword="IMsoDocExporter" /> interface that enables the workbook to be saved in a different fixed format.
trans-unit.target: 一个指向 <see langword="IMsoDocExporter" /> 接口的实现的指针，可使工作簿保存为另一种固定格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Extending the Office (2007) Fixed-Format Export Feature.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅“扩展 Office (2007) 固定格式导出功能”。

trans-unit.source: Exports to a file of the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 导出到指定格式的文件。

trans-unit.source: This method also supports initializing an add-in to export a file to a fixed-format file.
trans-unit.target: 此方法还支持初始化外接程序将文件导出到固定格式文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, Excel will perform file format conversion if the converters are present.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果存在转换器，则 Excel 将执行文件的格式转换。

trans-unit.source: The conversion is usually initiated by the user.
trans-unit.target: 通常由用户启动转换。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the value of the `EmployeeNameCell`<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control on `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置的值`EmployeeNameCell`<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控制上`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: Next, the example exports the contents of `EmployeeSeniorityCell` into a PDF document to the specified folder and file name.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，该示例将导出的内容`EmployeeSeniorityCell`为指定的文件夹和文件名称的 PDF 文档。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you populate the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control from an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，填充<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>从 XML 文件的控件。

trans-unit.source: This example hard-codes the value of the control for simplicity.
trans-unit.target: 此示例硬编码为简单起见控件的值。

trans-unit.source: Fills down from the top cell in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control to the bottom of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中的顶部单元格向下填充到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的底部。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> corresponds to only one cell, this method only fills one cell.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>仅一个单元格，此方法才会填满一个单元格对应于。

trans-unit.source: Fills left from the rightmost cell in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中的最右侧单元格向左填充。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> corresponds to only one cell, this method only fills one cell.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>仅一个单元格，此方法才会填满一个单元格对应于。

trans-unit.source: Fills right from the leftmost cell in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中的最左侧单元格向右填充。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> corresponds to only one cell, this method only fills one cell.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>仅一个单元格，此方法才会填满一个单元格对应于。

trans-unit.source: Fills up from the bottom cell in the specified range to the top of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从指定范围中的底部单元格向上填充到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> corresponds to only one cell, this method only fills one cell.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>仅一个单元格，此方法才会填满一个单元格对应于。

trans-unit.source: The data to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的数据。

trans-unit.source: Can be a string or any Microsoft Office Excel data type.
trans-unit.target: 可以是字符串或任何 Microsoft Office Excel 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The cell after which you want the search to begin.
trans-unit.target: 从其后开始搜索的单元格。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the position of the active cell when a search is done from the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 此单元格就是从用户界面执行的搜索完成后处于活动状态的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Note that <c>After</c> must be a single cell in the range.
trans-unit.target: 注意，<c>After</c> 必须是该范围中的单个单元格。

trans-unit.source: Remember that the search begins after this cell; the specified cell is not searched until the method wraps back around to this cell.
trans-unit.target: 请记住，搜索将从该单元格之后开始；只有方法绕回到指定的单元格之后，才会搜索该单元格。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify this argument, the search starts after the cell in the upper-left corner of the range.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定此参数，则从该范围左上角中的单元格之后开始搜索。

trans-unit.source: The type of information.
trans-unit.target: 信息的类型。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt" /> values: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt.xlWhole" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt.xlPart" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt" /> 值之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt.xlWhole" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt.xlPart" />。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder" /> values: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder.xlByRows" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder.xlByColumns" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder" /> 值之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder.xlByRows" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder.xlByColumns" />。

trans-unit.source: The search direction.
trans-unit.target: 搜索方向。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection" /> values:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection" /> 值之一：

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection.xlNext" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection.xlPrevious" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection.xlNext" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection.xlPrevious" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to make the search case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 如果在搜索时区分大小写，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Used only if you have selected or installed double-byte language support.
trans-unit.target: 仅当已选择或安装双字节语言支持时，才会用到此参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have double-byte characters match only double-byte characters; <see langword="false" /> to have double-byte characters match their single-byte equivalents.
trans-unit.target: 如果让双字节字符仅与双字节字符相匹配，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果让双字节字符与其单字节等效字符相匹配，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The search format.
trans-unit.target: 搜索格式。

trans-unit.source: Finds specific information in an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control, and returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the first cell where that information is found.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中查找指定信息，并返回表示在其中找到该信息的第一个单元格的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the first cell where the specified information is found.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，表示在其中找到指定信息的第一个单元格。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `null` if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`null`如果未找到匹配。

trans-unit.source: This method does not affect the selection or the active cell.
trans-unit.target: 选定内容或活动的单元格，则此方法不会影响。

trans-unit.source: The settings for `LookIn`, `LookAt`, `SearchOrder`, and `MatchByte` are saved each time you use this method.
trans-unit.target: 有关设置`LookIn`， `LookAt`， `SearchOrder`，和`MatchByte`保存每次使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify values for these arguments, the next time you call the method the saved values are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定这些参数的值，的下次调用该方法使用保存的值。

trans-unit.source: Setting these arguments changes the settings in the Find dialog box, and changing the settings in the Find dialog box changes the saved values that are used if you omit the arguments.
trans-unit.target: 设置这些参数将更改查找对话框中中的设置并更改查找对话框中的设置更改保存如果省略这些参数，则使用的值。

trans-unit.source: To avoid problems, set these arguments explicitly each time you use this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免出现问题，这些自变量显式设置每次使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.FindNext%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.FindPrevious%2A> methods to repeat the search.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.FindNext%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.FindPrevious%2A>方法重复搜索。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the value of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> to the string "Smith", and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Find%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FindNext%2A>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FindPrevious%2A> methods to find the first cell with the string "Smith".
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>到字符串"Smith"，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Find%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FindNext%2A>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FindPrevious%2A>查找具有"Smith"的字符串的第一个单元格的方法。

trans-unit.source: Because an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> always contains exactly one cell, the same cell is found in each case.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>始终包含恰好有一个单元格，相同单元文件位于每个用例。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: The cell after which you want to search.
trans-unit.target: 要在其之后搜索的单元格。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the position of the active cell when a search is done from the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 此单元格就是从用户界面执行的搜索完成后处于活动状态的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Note that <c>After</c> must be a single cell in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 注意，<c>After</c> 必须是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中的单个单元格。

trans-unit.source: Remember that the search begins after this cell; the specified cell is not searched until the method wraps back around to this cell.
trans-unit.target: 请记住，搜索将从该单元格之后开始；只有方法绕回到指定的单元格之后，才会搜索该单元格。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is not specified, the search starts after the cell in the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此参数，则从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件左上角中的单元格之后开始搜索。

trans-unit.source: Continues a search that was begun with the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Find(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 继续执行用 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Find(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)" /> 方法开始的搜索。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents a cell containing the specified information.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，表示包含指定信息的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Finds the next cell that matches the conditions specified for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Find%2A> method and returns a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> that represents that cell.
trans-unit.target: 查找为指定的条件相匹配的下一步单元格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Find%2A>方法并返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>表示该单元格。

trans-unit.source: This method does not affect the selection or the active cell.
trans-unit.target: 选定内容或活动的单元格，则此方法不会影响。

trans-unit.source: When the search reaches the end of the specified search range, it wraps around to the beginning of the range.
trans-unit.target: 如果搜索到达搜索指定的搜索范围的末尾，它会绕到范围的开始处。

trans-unit.source: To stop a search when this wraparound occurs, save the address of the first found cell, and then test each successive found-cell address against this saved address.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止搜索此头尾回绕发生时，保存的第一个找到的单元格的地址并随后测试此保存地址针对每个连续找到单元格地址。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the value of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> to the string "Smith", and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Find%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FindNext%2A>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FindPrevious%2A> methods to find the first cell with the string "Smith".
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>到字符串"Smith"，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Find%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FindNext%2A>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FindPrevious%2A>查找具有"Smith"的字符串的第一个单元格的方法。

trans-unit.source: Because an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> always contains exactly one cell, the same cell is found in each case.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>始终包含恰好有一个单元格，相同单元文件位于每个用例。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: The cell before which you want to search.
trans-unit.target: 要在其之前搜索的单元格。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the position of the active cell when a search is done from the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 此单元格就是从用户界面执行的搜索完成后处于活动状态的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Note that <c>After</c> must be a single cell in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 注意，<c>After</c> 必须是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中的单个单元格。

trans-unit.source: Remember that the search begins before this cell; the specified cell is not searched until the method wraps back around to this cell.
trans-unit.target: 请记住，搜索将从该单元格之后开始；只有方法绕回到指定的单元格之后，才会搜索该单元格。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is not specified, the search starts before the upper-left cell in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此参数，则从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件左上角单元格之前开始搜索。

trans-unit.source: Continues a search that was begun with the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Find(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 继续执行用 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Find(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)" /> 方法开始的搜索。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents a cell containing the specified information.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，表示包含指定信息的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Finds the previous cell that matches the conditions specified for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Find%2A> method and returns a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> object that represents that cell.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的条件相匹配的前一个单元的查找<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Find%2A>方法并返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>表示该单元格的对象。

trans-unit.source: This method does not affect the selection or the active cell.
trans-unit.target: 选定内容或活动的单元格，则此方法不会影响。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the value of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> to the string "Smith", and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Find%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FindNext%2A>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FindPrevious%2A> methods to find the first cell with the string "Smith".
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>到字符串"Smith"，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Find%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FindNext%2A>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FindPrevious%2A>查找具有"Smith"的字符串的第一个单元格的方法。

trans-unit.source: Because an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> always contains exactly one cell, the same cell is found in each case.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>始终包含恰好有一个单元格，相同单元文件位于每个用例。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Font" /> that represents the font of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Font" /> 控件的字体的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Font" /> that represents the font of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Font" /> 控件的字体的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Font%2A> property to display the current font for an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Font%2A>属性显示的当前字体<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.FormatConditions" /> collection that represents all the conditional formats for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.FormatConditions" /> 集合，该集合表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的所有条件格式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.FormatConditions" /> collection that represents all the conditional formats for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.FormatConditions" /> 集合，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的所有条件格式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FormatConditions%2A> property to alter the font of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> if the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> is less than the value of cell A1.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FormatConditions%2A>属性更改的字体<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>如果的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>小于 A1 单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerZipCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerZipCell`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the formula of an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control in A1-style notation.
trans-unit.target: 以 A1 样式表示法获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的公式。

trans-unit.source: The formula of an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control in A1-style notation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的公式（以 A1 样式表示法表示）。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control contains a constant, this property returns the constant.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件包含一个常数，则此属性返回的常量。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control is empty, this property returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件为空，则此属性返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control contains a formula, this property returns the formula as a string in the same format in which it would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign).
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件包含一个公式，则此属性与在其中它将显示在公式栏 （包括等号） 相同的格式以字符串形式返回该公式。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value or formula of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control to a date, Microsoft Office Excel checks to see whether that cell is already formatted with one of the date or time number formats.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置的值或公式<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控制为日期，Microsoft Office Excel 将检查以查看是否使用日期或时间的数字格式之一已格式化该单元格。

trans-unit.source: If not, Excel changes the number format to the default short date number format.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有，Excel 更改为默认的短日期数字格式的数字格式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Formula%2A> property to set the value of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> to equal the sum of the values of cells A1 and A2.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Formula%2A>属性设置的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>为相等的单元格 A1 和 A2 的值的总和。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerAddress1Cell` with a corresponding schema element of type `int`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerAddress1Cell`类型的相应架构元素使用`int`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the array formula of an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的数组公式。

trans-unit.source: The array formula of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的数组公式。

trans-unit.source: This property gets (or can be set to) a single formula or an array.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取 （或可以将设置为） 的单个公式或数组。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control does not contain an array formula, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件不包含公式的数组，此属性返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: If you use this property to enter an array formula, the formula must use the R1C1 reference style, not the A1 reference style.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性用于输入数组公式，该公式必须使用 R1C1 引用样式，不将 A1 引用样式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FormulaArray%2A> property to set the value of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> to equal the sum of the array of cells A1 through A3.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FormulaArray%2A>属性设置的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>为相等的单元格 A1 A3 到数组的总和。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerAddress1Cell` with a corresponding schema element of type `int`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerAddress1Cell`类型的相应架构元素使用`int`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the formula in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control is hidden when the worksheet is protected.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在工作表受保护时是否隐藏 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中的公式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the formula is hidden when the worksheet is protected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在工作表受保护时隐藏公式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Do not confuse this property with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Hidden%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性与不混淆<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Hidden%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The formula is not hidden if the workbook is protected and the worksheet is not.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿受到保护并且不是工作表中未隐藏的公式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the formula for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control, using A1-style references in the language of the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的公式，该公式使用用户语言的 A1 样式的引用。

trans-unit.source: The formula for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control, using A1-style references in the language of the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的公式，使用用户语言的 A1 样式的引用。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control contains a constant, this property returns that constant.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件包含一个常数，则此属性返回该常量。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control is empty, the property returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件为空，则该属性返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control contains a formula, the property returns the formula as a string, in the same format in which it would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign).
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件包含一个公式，则该属性返回为字符串，其中它将显示在公式栏 （包括等号） 的格式相同的公式。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value or formula of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control to a date, Microsoft Office Excel checks to see whether that cell is already formatted with one of the date or time number formats.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置的值或公式<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控制为日期，Microsoft Office Excel 将检查以查看是否使用日期或时间的数字格式之一已格式化该单元格。

trans-unit.source: If not, the number format is changed to the default short date number format.
trans-unit.target: 否则，数字格式更改为默认的短日期数字格式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FormulaLocal%2A> property to set the value of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> to equal the sum of the values of cells A1 and A2.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FormulaLocal%2A>属性设置的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>为相等的单元格 A1 和 A2 的值的总和。

trans-unit.source: The formula is localized according to the language of the system it is run on.
trans-unit.target: 该公式根据系统运行的语言进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerAddress1Cell` with a corresponding schema element of type `int`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerAddress1Cell`类型的相应架构元素使用`int`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the formula for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control, using R1C1-style notation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的公式（使用 R1C1 样式的表示法）。

trans-unit.source: The formula for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control, using R1C1-style notation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的公式（使用 R1C1 样式的表示法）。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control contains a constant, this property returns the constant.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件包含一个常数，则此属性返回的常量。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control is empty, the property returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件为空，则该属性返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control contains a formula, the property returns the formula as a string, in the same format in which it would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign).
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件包含一个公式，则该属性返回为字符串，其中它将显示在公式栏 （包括等号） 的格式相同的公式。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value or formula of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control to a date, Microsoft Office Excel checks to see whether that cell is already formatted with one of the date or time number formats.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置的值或公式<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控制为日期，Microsoft Office Excel 将检查以查看是否使用日期或时间的数字格式之一已格式化该单元格。

trans-unit.source: If not, the number format is changed to the default short date number format.
trans-unit.target: 否则，数字格式更改为默认的短日期数字格式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FormulaR1C1%2A> property to set the value of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> to equal the square root of cell A1, as specified using R1C1 notation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FormulaR1C1%2A>属性设置的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>为 A1 单元格，平方根等于作为使用 R1C1 表示法指定。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerAddress1Cell` with a corresponding schema element of type `int`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerAddress1Cell`类型的相应架构元素使用`int`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the formula for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control, using R1C1-style notation in the language of the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的公式，该公式使用用户语言的 R1C1 样式表示法。

trans-unit.source: The formula for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control, using R1C1-style notation in the language of the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的公式，使用用户语言的 R1C1 样式表示法。

trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件包含一个公式，则此属性将该公式返回为字符串，其中它将显示在公式栏 （包括等号） 的格式相同。

trans-unit.target: 否则，数字格式更改为默认的短日期数字格式。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.FormulaR1C1Local%2A>属性设置的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>为 A1 单元格，平方根等于作为使用 R1C1 表示法指定。

trans-unit.source: The formula is localized according to the language of the system it is run on.
trans-unit.target: 该公式根据系统运行的语言进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerAddress1Cell` with a corresponding schema element of type `int`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerAddress1Cell`类型的相应架构元素使用`int`。

trans-unit.source: Starts the Function Wizard for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件启动“函数向导”。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that can be used to iterate over an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个枚举器，该枚举器可以循环访问 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object that can be used to iterate over an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 对象，可以用于在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件上进行循环访问。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> corresponds to only one cell, this method returns an enumerator that can only iterate over one cell.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>仅对应于一个单元格，此方法返回的枚举数可以仅循环通过在一个单元格。

trans-unit.source: The first value to be grouped.
trans-unit.target: 要进行分组的第一个值。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted or <see langword="true" />, the first value in the field is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数或者它为 <see langword="true" />，则使用该字段中的第一个值。

trans-unit.source: The last value to be grouped.
trans-unit.target: 要进行分组的最后一个值。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted or <see langword="true" />, the last value in the field is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数或者它为 <see langword="true" />，则使用该字段中的最后一个值。

trans-unit.source: If the field is numeric, this argument specifies the size of each group.
trans-unit.target: 如果该字段为数值字段，则此参数指定每组的大小。

trans-unit.source: If the field is a date, this argument specifies the number of days in each group if element 4 in the <c>Periods</c> array is <see langword="true" /> and all the other elements are <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该字段是日期字段，则此参数指定当 <c>Periods</c> 数组中的元素 4 为 <see langword="true" /> 而所有其他元素为 <see langword="false" /> 时每一组中的天数。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this argument is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 否则，将忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Office Excel automatically chooses a default group size.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Microsoft Office Excel 会自动选择一个默认的组大小。

trans-unit.source: An array of seven Boolean values that specify the period for the group, as shown:
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，包含七个为该组指定时间段的布尔值，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: 1 - Seconds
2 - Minutes
trans-unit.target: 2 — 分钟

trans-unit.source: 3 - Hours
4 - Days
trans-unit.target: 4 — 日期

trans-unit.source: 5 - Months
trans-unit.target: 5 — 月份

trans-unit.source: 6 - Quarters
trans-unit.target: 6 — 季度

trans-unit.source: 7 - Years
trans-unit.target: 7 — 年份

trans-unit.source: If an element in the array is <see langword="true" />, a group is created for the corresponding time; if the element is <see langword="false" />, no group is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组中的某个元素为 <see langword="true" />，则针对相应的时间创建一个组；如果该元素为 <see langword="false" />，则不创建组。

trans-unit.source: If the field is not a date field, this argument is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果字段不是日期字段，则省略此参数。

trans-unit.source: When the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control represents a single cell in the data range of a PivotTable field, the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Group(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)" /> method performs numeric or date-based grouping in that field.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件表示数据透视表字段的数据范围中的单个单元格时，<see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Group(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)" /> 方法在该字段中执行基于数值或日期的分组。

trans-unit.source: The indent level can be an integer from 0 to 15.
trans-unit.target: 缩进级别可以是从 0 到 15 的整数。

trans-unit.source: Using this property to set the indent level to a number less than 0 (zero) or greater than 15 causes an error.

trans-unit.source: Specifies which way to shift the cells.
trans-unit.target: 指定移动单元格的方向。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlInsertShiftDirection" /> values: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlInsertShiftDirection.xlShiftToRight" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlInsertShiftDirection.xlShiftDown" />.

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Office Excel selects a value.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Microsoft Office Excel 会选择一个值。

trans-unit.source: The copy origin.
trans-unit.target: 复制原点。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents a range at an offset to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，表示距离 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的某偏移量处的范围。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Item%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Item%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The index number of the cell you want to access, in order from left to right.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的索引号你想要访问，请按从左到右的顺序。

trans-unit.source: A number or string that indicates the column number of the cell you want to access, starting with either 1 or "A" for the first column in the range.
trans-unit.target: 数字或字符串，指示你想要访问，该单元格的列号开头 1 或"A"的范围中的第一列。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Item%2A> without specifying any parameters, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Item%2A> will get an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange_ItemType> object that is part of the Office development tools in Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Item%2A>而不指定任何参数，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Item%2A>将获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange_ItemType>对象属于的 Office 开发工具在 Visual Studio 基础结构和不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: The `RowIndex` and `ColumnIndex` arguments are relative offsets.
trans-unit.target: `RowIndex`和`ColumnIndex`自变量是相对偏移量。

trans-unit.source: In other words, specifying a `RowIndex` of 1 returns cells in the first row of the range, not the first row of the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，指定`RowIndex`1 的范围不工作表中的第一行的第一行中返回的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Item%2A> property to select the cell that is offset from an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> by three columns and three rows.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Item%2A>属性以选择从偏移量的单元格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>由三个列和三个行。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Rearranges the text in an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control so that it fills the range evenly.
trans-unit.target: 重新排列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中的文本以使其均匀填充范围。

trans-unit.source: If the range is not large enough, Microsoft Office Excel displays a message telling you that text extends below the range.
trans-unit.target: 如果范围不足够大，Microsoft Office Excel 会显示一消息，告知你文本范围的扩展。

trans-unit.source: If you click the **OK** button, justified text replaces the contents in cells that extend beyond the selected range.
trans-unit.target: 如果你单击**确定**按钮，对齐的文本替换中扩展到所选范围之外的单元格的内容。

trans-unit.source: To prevent this message from appearing, set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Application.DisplayAlerts%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止出现此消息，将设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Application.DisplayAlerts%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: After you set this property, text always replaces the contents in cells below the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性后，文本始终替换下面的单元中的内容<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the distance from the left edge of column A to the left edge of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值表示从列 A 的左边缘到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的左边缘之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: The distance from the left edge of column A to the left edge of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从列 A 的左边缘到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的左边缘的距离。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Left%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Top%2A> properties to display the distance from the left edge of column A to the left edge of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>, and the distance from the top of row 1 to the top edge of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Left%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Top%2A>属性，以显示从列 A 到左边缘的左边缘的距离<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>，以及按自上而下的行 1 到上边缘的距离<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Pastes a list of all displayed names onto the worksheet, beginning with the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将包含所有显示的名称的列表粘贴到工作表上（从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件开始）。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Application.Names%2A> property to return a collection of all the names on a worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Application.Names%2A>属性返回的工作表上的所有名称的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ListObject" /> for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ListObject" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ListObject" /> for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ListObject" /> 控件的一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a constant that describes the part of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTable" /> report that contains the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个常数，该常数描述包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTable" /> 控件左上角的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 报表部分。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLocationInTable" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLocationInTable" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.LocationInTable%2A> can be one of the following <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLocationInTable?displayProperty=fullName> values:
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.LocationInTable%2A> 可以是以下之一<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLocationInTable?displayProperty=fullName>值：

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control is locked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件是否处于锁定状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control is locked; <see langword="false" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control can be modified when the sheet is protected; <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control contains both locked and unlocked cells.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件处于锁定状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件可以在该表处于保护状态时进行修改，则为 <see langword="false" />；如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中既包含处于锁定状态的单元格又包含处于未锁定状态的单元格，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an MDX expression that describes the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个描述 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 的 MDX 表达式。

trans-unit.source: An MDX expression that describes the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个描述 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 的 MDX 表达式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to merge cells in each row of the specified range as separate merged cells.
trans-unit.target: 如果将指定范围中每一行中的单元格作为单独的合并单元格来合并，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a merged cell from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件创建一个合并单元格。

trans-unit.source: The value of a merged range is specified in the cell in the upper-left corner of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control.
trans-unit.target: 合并范围的值指定在左上角单元格中<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the merged range containing the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，它表示包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的合并范围。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the merged range containing the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，表示包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的合并范围。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control is not in a merged range, this property returns the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件不在合并范围中，则此属性返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.MergeArea%2A> property only works on a single-cell range.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.MergeArea%2A>属性仅适用于单单元格范围。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.MergeArea%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.MergeCells%2A> properties before and after merging a range that contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.MergeArea%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.MergeCells%2A>属性之前和之后合并包含的范围<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell` that is in one of the cells from cell B2 to B5.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`，它是在某个单元格 B2 至 B5 单元格。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control contains merged cells.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件是否包含合并单元格。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control contains merged cells; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件包含合并单元格，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.MergeArea%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.MergeCells%2A> properties before and after merging a range that contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.MergeArea%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.MergeCells%2A>属性之前和之后合并包含的范围<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell` that is in one of the cells from cell B2 to B5.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`，它是在某个单元格 B2 至 B5 单元格。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value representing a defined name for an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的定义名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Name" /> object that represents a defined name for an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Name" /> 对象，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的定义名称。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Name?displayProperty=fullName> that refers to the cell occupied by an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> to the current worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Name?displayProperty=fullName>的引用所占用的单元格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>到当前工作表。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Name%2A> property to display the name that now refers to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Name%2A>属性来显示的名称现在是指<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the direction to navigate: <see langword="true" /> to navigate toward precedents; <see langword="false" /> to navigate toward dependents.
trans-unit.target: 指定导航方向：如果朝着引用单元格导航，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果朝着依赖单元格导航，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the arrow number to navigate; corresponds to the numbered reference in the cell's formula.
trans-unit.target: 指定要定位的箭头编号；与单元格公式中带编号的引用相对应。

trans-unit.source: If the arrow is an external reference arrow, this argument indicates which external reference to follow.
trans-unit.target: 如果该箭头是外部引用箭头，则此参数指示要遵循哪个外部引用。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the first external reference is followed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则遵循第一个外部引用。

trans-unit.source: Navigates a tracer arrow for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control to the precedent, dependent, or error-causing cell or cells.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的跟踪标志箭头定位到引用单元格、依赖单元格或导致错误的单元格。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the new selection.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示新的所选内容的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: Selects the precedent, dependent, or error cells.
trans-unit.target: 选择引用单元格、 相关或错误的单元格。

trans-unit.source: This method causes an error if it is applied to a cell without visible tracer arrows.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用于没有可见追踪箭头的单元格，则此方法会导致错误。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: The following code example makes cell A1 a dependent of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使 A1 单元格的从属<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.ShowDependents%2A> method to draw an arrow between an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> and the dependent cell, and calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.NavigateArrow%2A> method to select the dependent cell.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.ShowDependents%2A>方法之间绘制一个箭头<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>从属单元格，并调用和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.NavigateArrow%2A>方法来选择依赖的单元格。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the next cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示下一个单元格的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the next cell.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示下一个单元格的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: This property emulates the TAB key, although the property returns the next cell without selecting it.
trans-unit.target: 此属性模拟 TAB 键，但该属性返回的下一个单元而不选择它。

trans-unit.source: On a protected sheet, this property returns the next unlocked cell.
trans-unit.target: 对于受保护的表，此属性返回的下一步解锁单元格。

trans-unit.source: On an unprotected sheet, this property always returns the cell immediately to the right of the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: 在未受保护的工作表，此属性始终返回该单元格立即指定的单元格右侧。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Next%2A> property to select the cell to the right of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Next%2A>属性来选择右侧的单元格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the note (up to 255 characters).
trans-unit.target: 要添加到说明中的文本（最多 255 个字符）。

trans-unit.source: The text is inserted starting at position <c>Start</c>, replacing <c>Length</c> characters of the existing note.
trans-unit.target: 该文本将从 <c>Start</c> 位置处开始插入，并替换现有注释的 <c>Length</c> 个字符。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, this method returns the current text of the note starting at position <c>Start</c>, for <c>Length</c> characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则此方法将返回该注释中从 <c>Start</c> 位置开始的 <c>Length</c> 个字符的当前文本。

trans-unit.source: The starting position for the text that is set or returned.
trans-unit.target: 所设置或返回的文本的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, this method starts at the first character.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则此方法将从第一个字符开始。

trans-unit.source: To append text to the note, specify a number larger than the number of characters in the existing note.
trans-unit.target: 若要向该注释追加文本，请指定一个比现有注释中字符数大的数字。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to be set or returned.
trans-unit.target: 要设置或返回的字符数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Office Excel sets or returns characters from the starting position to the end of the note (up to 255 characters).
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Microsoft Office Excel 将设置或返回从注释的起始位置到末尾的字符（最多 255 个字符）。

trans-unit.source: If there are more than 255 characters from <c>Start</c> to the end of the note, this method returns only 255 characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果从注释的 <c>Start</c> 到末尾有 255 个以上的字符，则此方法只返回 255 个字符。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cell note associated with the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件相关联的单元格说明。

trans-unit.source: Cell notes have been replaced by range comments.
trans-unit.target: 单元格说明已替换为范围注释。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Comment> object.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Comment>对象。

trans-unit.source: To add a note that contains more than 255 characters, use this method once to specify the first 255 characters, and then use it again to append the remainder of the note (no more than 255 characters at a time).
trans-unit.target: 若要添加包含超过 255 个字符的注释，使用此方法一次并将检索指定的前 255 个字符，然后再次使用它要追加的说明 （一次不超过 255 个字符） 的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.NoteText%2A> method to add a note to an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>, and then prompts the user to remove the note by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.ClearNotes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.NoteText%2A>方法添加到注释<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>，然后会提示用户通过移除注意<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.ClearNotes%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `null` if all cells in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control do not have the same number format.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`null`如果中的所有单元格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件不具有相同的数字格式。

trans-unit.source: The format code is the same string as the **Format Codes** option in the **Format Cells** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 格式代码是相同的字符串**格式代码**选项**设置单元格格式**对话框。

trans-unit.source: The `Format` function uses different format code strings than do the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NumberFormat%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NumberFormatLocal%2A> properties.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that is offset from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，它表示距离 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that is offset from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，表示距离 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Offset%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Offset%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The number of rows (positive, negative, or 0 (zero)) by which the range is to be offset.
trans-unit.target: 行 （正数、 负数还是 0 （零）） 数的范围是偏移。

trans-unit.source: Positive values are offset downward, and negative values are offset upward.
trans-unit.target: 表示向下偏移正值和负值表示向上偏移。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns (positive, negative, or 0 (zero)) by which the range is to be offset.
trans-unit.target: 列 （正数、 负数还是 0 （零）） 数的范围是偏移。

trans-unit.source: Positive values are offset to the right, and negative values are offset to the left.
trans-unit.target: 在右侧偏移正值和负值表示向左侧偏移。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Offset%2A> without specifying any parameters, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Offset%2A> will get an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange_OffsetType> object that is part of the Office development tools in Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Offset%2A>而不指定任何参数，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Offset%2A>将获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange_OffsetType>对象属于的 Office 开发工具在 Visual Studio 基础结构和不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Offset%2A> property to select a range that is offset from an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> by three cells to the right and three cells down.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Offset%2A>属性选择的范围的偏移量位置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>由三个单元格右侧和三个单元格下移。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the text orientation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个指定文本方向的值。

trans-unit.source: An integer in the range of -90 to 90 degrees that specifies the text orientation.
trans-unit.target: 一个 -90 至 90 度范围内的整数，指定文本方向。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current outline level of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 的当前大纲级别。

trans-unit.source: The current outline level of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 的当前大纲级别。

trans-unit.source: Level one is the outermost summary level.
trans-unit.target: 级别 1 是最外层的摘要级别。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of a page break.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置分页符的位置。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property using one of the following <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPageBreak>values:
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置此属性使用以下项之一<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPageBreak>值：

trans-unit.source: This property can return the location of either automatic or manual page breaks, but it can only set the location of manual breaks (it can only be set to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPageBreak.xlPageBreakManual> or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPageBreak.xlPageBreakNone>).
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以返回的位置是自动还是手动上的分页符，但它仅可以将手动换页符的位置进行设置 (它只能设置为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPageBreak.xlPageBreakManual>或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPageBreak.xlPageBreakNone>)。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.PageBreak%2A>属性设置在分页符<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet" />，它表示包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的工作表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet" /> that represents the worksheet containing the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet" />，表示包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的工作表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Parent%2A> property to display the name of the parent <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName> of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Parent%2A>属性显示的父级名称<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName>的<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains left and right brackets to indicate where the cells should be split.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含指示应在何处拆分单元格的左中括号和右中括号。

trans-unit.source: For example, "<c>[xxx][xxx]</c>" would insert the first three characters into the first column of the destination range, and it would insert the next three characters into the second column.
trans-unit.target: 例如，“<c>[xxx][xxx]</c>”会在目标范围的第一列中插入前三个字符，并在第二列中插入随后的三个字符。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Office Excel guesses where to split the columns based on the spacing of the top left cell in the range.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Microsoft Office Excel 基于该范围中左上角单元格的间距猜测在何处拆分列。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use a different range to guess the parse line, use a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> as the <c>ParseLine</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果要使用另一个范围来猜测分析行，请将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 用作 <c>ParseLine</c> 参数。

trans-unit.source: That range must be one of the cells that is being parsed.
trans-unit.target: 该范围必须是正被分析的那些单元格之一。

trans-unit.source: The <c>ParseLine</c> argument cannot be longer than 255 characters, including the brackets and spaces.
trans-unit.target: <c>ParseLine</c> 参数不能超过 255 个字符，包括括号和空格。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the upper-left corner of the destination range for the parsed data.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，表示分析数据的目标范围的左上角。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Excel parses in place.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Excel 就地分析。

trans-unit.source: Parses a range of data and breaks it into multiple cells
trans-unit.target: 分析数据的范围并将其分成多个单元格

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Parse%2A> method to parse the value of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> into three different cells beginning at cell A5.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Parse%2A>方法，以便分析的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>到三个不同的单元格在单元格 A5 开头的位置。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerAddress1Cell` with a corresponding schema element of type `int`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerAddress1Cell`类型的相应架构元素使用`int`。

trans-unit.source: The part of the range to be pasted.
trans-unit.target: 该范围中要粘贴的部分。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteType" /> values:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteType" /> 值之一：

trans-unit.source: The paste operation.
trans-unit.target: 粘贴操作。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteSpecialOperation" /> values:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteSpecialOperation" /> 值之一：

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to not have blank cells in the range on the Clipboard pasted into the destination range.
trans-unit.target: 如果不将剪贴板上该范围中的空单元格粘贴到目标范围，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to transpose rows and columns when the range is pasted.
trans-unit.target: 如果在粘贴该范围时对行和列进行转置，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Pastes the contents of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> from the Clipboard into the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 的内容从剪贴板粘贴到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Copy%2A> method to copy an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> to the Clipboard, and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.PasteSpecial%2A> method to copy the range to a different <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Copy%2A>方法以复制<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>到剪贴板，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.PasteSpecial%2A>方法将该范围复制为另一种<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含两个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件名为`CustomerFirstNameCell`和`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Phonetic" /> object which contains information about a specific phonetic text string in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Phonetic" /> object which contains information about a specific phonetic text string in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Phonetics" /> collection of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Phonetics" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 集合。
