trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotItem" /> that represents the PivotTable item containing the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotItem" />，表示包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的左上角的数据透视表项。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTable" /> that represents the PivotTable report containing the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control, or the PivotTable report associated with the PivotChart report.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTable" />，它表示包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的左上角的数据透视表，或是与数据透视图相关联的数据透视表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTable" /> that represents the PivotTable report containing the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control, or the PivotTable report associated with the PivotChart report.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTable" />，表示包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的左上角的数据透视表，或是与数据透视图相关联的数据透视表。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents all the precedents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，它表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的所有引用单元格。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents all the precedents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的所有引用单元格。

trans-unit.source: This can be a multiple selection (a union of <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> objects) if there is more than one precedent.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是多重选择 (的并集<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>对象) 如果存在多个引用单元格。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets a reference in cell A2 to refer to cell A1, and then sets a reference in an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> to refer to cell A2.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置单元格 A2 来引用单元格 A1 中的引用，然后设置的引用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>来引用单元格 A2。

trans-unit.source: The code example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Precedents%2A> property to select the precedents of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>, which are cells A1 and A2.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Precedents%2A>属性选择的引用单元格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>，这是单元格 A1 和 A2。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerAddress1Cell` with a corresponding schema element of type `int`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerAddress1Cell`类型的相应架构元素使用`int`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the prefix character for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的前缀字符。

trans-unit.source: The prefix character for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的前缀字符。

trans-unit.source: The prefix is returned as a string.
trans-unit.target: 前缀是作为字符串返回。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to cast the object returned to a char results in an invalid cast exception.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将对象强制转换返回到字符会导致无效的强制转换异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Application.TransitionNavigKeys%2A> property is `false`, this prefix character is ' for a text label, or blank.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Application.TransitionNavigKeys%2A>属性是`false`，此前缀字符是对于文本标签，或为空。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Application.TransitionNavigKeys%2A> property is `true`, this character is ' for a left-justified label, " for a right-justified label, ^ for a centered label, \ for a repeated label, or blank.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Application.TransitionNavigKeys%2A>属性是`true`，该字符是左对齐的标签，"右对齐的标签，^ 的居中添加 \ 重复的标签，标签或留空。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.PrefixCharacter%2A> property to display the prefix character for an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.PrefixCharacter%2A>属性显示的前缀字符<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the previous cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示上一个单元格的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the previous cell.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示上一个单元格的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: This property emulates pressing SHIFT+TAB; unlike the key combination, however, the property returns the previous cell without selecting it.
trans-unit.target: 此属性会模拟按下 SHIFT + TAB;与不同的键的组合，但是，该属性返回上一个单元格而不选择它。

trans-unit.source: On a protected sheet, this property returns the previous unlocked cell.
trans-unit.target: 对于受保护的表，此属性返回上一个解锁单元格。

trans-unit.source: On an unprotected sheet, this property always returns the cell immediately to the left of the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: 在未受保护的工作表，此属性始终返回该单元格立即指定的单元格左侧。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Previous%2A> property to select the cell to the left of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Previous%2A>属性选择该单元格左侧<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: The number of the page at which to start printing.
trans-unit.target: 要从其处开始打印的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, printing starts at the first page.
trans-unit.target: 若忽略此参数，则从第一页开始打印。

trans-unit.source: The number of the last page to print.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的最后一页的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, printing ends with the last page.
trans-unit.target: 若忽略此参数，则打印至最后一页。

trans-unit.source: The number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的份数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, one copy is printed.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略此参数，则打印一份。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Microsoft Office Excel invoke print preview before printing the object.
trans-unit.target: 若要在打印对象前让 Microsoft Office Excel 调用打印预览，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to print the object immediately.
trans-unit.target: 若要立即打印对象，请使用 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of the active printer.
trans-unit.target: 设置活动打印机的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to print to a file.
trans-unit.target: 若要打印到文件，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If <c>PrToFileName</c> is not specified, Excel prompts the user to enter the name of the output file.
trans-unit.target: 若未指定 <c>PrToFileName</c>，则 Excel 会提示用户输入输出文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to collate multiple copies.
trans-unit.target: 若逐份打印多个副本，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If <c>PrintToFile</c> is set to <see langword="true" />, this argument specifies the name of the file you want to print to.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>PrintToFile</c> 设为 <see langword="true" />，则此参数指定要打印到的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Prints out the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" />.
trans-unit.target: 打印输出 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" />。

trans-unit.source: "Pages" in the descriptions of `From` and `To` refers to printed pages, not to pages in the range.
trans-unit.target: "页"中的说明`From`和`To`打印页，而不是的范围中的页引用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the value of the `EmployeeNameCell`<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control on `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置的值`EmployeeNameCell`<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控制上`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: Next, the example prints one copy of the first two pages of the contents of `EmployeeNameCell` to the default printer.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，该示例打印一份的内容的前两页`EmployeeNameCell`到默认打印机。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you populate the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control from an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，填充<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>从 XML 文件的控件。

trans-unit.source: This example hard-codes the value of the control for simplicity.
trans-unit.target: 此示例硬编码为简单起见控件的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to allow changes to the margins and page setup while displaying the print preview; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则允许在显示打印预览时更改边距和页面设置；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Shows a preview of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control as it would look when printed.
trans-unit.target: 显示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的预览（显示打印时的外观）。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.PrintPreview%2A> method to display a print preview of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.PrintPreview%2A>方法以显示打印预览<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.QueryTable" /> that represents the query table that intersects the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.QueryTable" />，它表示与 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件相交的查询表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.QueryTable" /> that represents the query table that intersects the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.QueryTable" />，表示与 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件相交的查询表。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.QueryTable%2A>属性刷新相交的查询表<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell` that is intersected by a query table.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`，相交的查询表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the reading order for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的读取顺序。

trans-unit.source: One of the following values: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Constants.xlRTL" /> (right-to-left), <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Constants.xlLTR" /> (left-to-right), or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Constants.xlContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 以下值之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Constants.xlRTL" />（从右向左）、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Constants.xlLTR" />（从左向右）或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Constants.xlContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Some of these constants may not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you have selected or installed.
trans-unit.target: 这些常量中的某些可能不可用，具体取决于的语言支持 （美国美式英语）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.ReadingOrder%2A> property to reverse the reading order of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>, if the current language that is selected or installed supports it.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.ReadingOrder%2A>属性要反转的阅读顺序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>，如果选择或安装的当前语言支持它。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Array of indexes of the columns that contain the duplicate information.
trans-unit.target: 包含重复信息的列的索引数组。

trans-unit.source: If nothing is passed then it assumes all columns contain duplicate information.
trans-unit.target: 如果未传入任何参数则假定所有列都包含重复信息。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="XlYesNoGuess" /> that specifies whether the first row contains header information.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="XlYesNoGuess" />，它指定第一行中是否包含标题信息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="xlNo" /> is the default value; specify <see langword="xlGuess" /> if you want Excel to attempt to determine the header.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="xlNo" /> 是默认值；如果希望让 Excel 尝试确定标题，请指定 <see langword="xlGuess" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes duplicate values from a range of values.
trans-unit.target: 从某一范围的值中移除重复值。

trans-unit.source: Removes subtotals from an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件移除小计。

trans-unit.source: The string you want Microsoft Office Excel to search for.
trans-unit.target: 希望 Microsoft Office Excel 搜索的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The replacement string.
trans-unit.target: 替换字符串。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt.xlWhole" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt.xlPart" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt.xlWhole" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt.xlPart" />。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder.xlByRows" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder.xlByColumns" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder.xlByRows" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder.xlByColumns" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to make the search case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 如果在搜索时区分大小写，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this argument only if you have selected or installed double-byte language support in Excel.
trans-unit.target: 仅当已在 Excel 中选择或安装双字节语言支持时，才会用到此参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have double-byte characters match only double-byte characters; <see langword="false" /> to have double-byte characters match their single-byte equivalents.
trans-unit.target: 如果让双字节字符仅与双字节字符相匹配，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果让双字节字符与其单字节等效字符相匹配，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The search format for the method.
trans-unit.target: 该方法的搜索格式。

trans-unit.source: The replace format for the method.
trans-unit.target: 该方法的替换格式。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the specified characters in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control with a new string.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中指定的字符替换为新字符串。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified characters are in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定字符在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Using this method does not change either the selection or the active cell.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法不会更改选定内容或活动的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The settings for `LookAt`, `SearchOrder`, `MatchCase`, and `MatchByte` are saved each time you use this method.
trans-unit.target: 有关设置`LookAt`， `SearchOrder`， `MatchCase`，和`MatchByte`保存每次使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify values for these arguments the next time you call the method, the saved values are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不指定这些参数的值在调用该方法的下一步时，将使用保存的值。

trans-unit.source: Setting these arguments changes the settings in the **Find** dialog box, and changing the settings in the **Find** dialog box changes the saved values that are used if you omit the arguments.
trans-unit.target: 设置这些参数将更改中的设置**查找**对话框中，并更改中的设置**查找**对话框中更改如果省略这些参数，则使用的已保存的值。

trans-unit.source: To avoid problems, set these arguments explicitly each time you use this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免出现问题，这些自变量显式设置每次使用此方法。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Replace%2A> method to replace the string "Smith" with the string "Jones" within an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Replace%2A>方法中将字符串"Jones"的字符串"Smith" <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a resized <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> based on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个基于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 控件调整大小的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" />。

trans-unit.source: A resized <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> based on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个基于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 控件调整大小的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Resize%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Resize%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The number of rows in the new range.
trans-unit.target: 新的范围中的行数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the number of rows in the range remains the same.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，该范围中的行数保持不变。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns in the new range.
trans-unit.target: 新的范围中的列数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the number of columns in the range remains the same.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，该范围中的列数保持不变。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `false` if any of the children of the row or column are hidden.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`false`如果任何行或列的子级处于隐藏状态。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `true` is equivalent to showing all the children of the summary row or column.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `false` is equivalent to hiding all the children of the summary row or column.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`false`等效于隐藏摘要行或列的所有子级。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> is an outlining summary row or column; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A single cell to use as the row input for your table.

trans-unit.source: Creates a data table based on input values and formulas that you define on a worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 根据输入值和在工作表上定义的公式创建数据表。

trans-unit.source: Use data tables to perform a what-if analysis by changing certain constant values on your worksheet to see how values in other cells are affected.
trans-unit.target: 使用数据表通过更改某些常量值在工作表中，若要查看如何影响其他单元格中的值执行假设分析。

trans-unit.source: If the range is larger than a single cell, the top left cell is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果范围大于单个单元格，则使用左上角的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The format of the text to be split into columns.
trans-unit.target: 要拆分成多列的文本的格式。

trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType" /> 常量之一：

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" /> (default)
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" />（默认值）

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextQualifier" /> values:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextQualifier" /> 值之一：

trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextQualifier.xlTextQualifierDoubleQuote" />（默认值）

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Excel consider consecutive delimiters as one delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 如果让 Excel 将连续分隔符视为一个分隔符，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have <c>DataType</c> be <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" /> and to have the tab character be a delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 如果让 <c>DataType</c> 为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" />，并将制表符用作分隔符，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have <c>DataType</c> be <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" /> and to have the semicolon be a delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 如果让 <c>DataType</c> 为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" />，并将分号用作分隔符，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have <c>DataType</c> be <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" /> and to have the comma be a delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 如果让 <c>DataType</c> 为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" />，并将逗号用作分隔符，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have <c>DataType</c> be <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" /> and to have the space character be a delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 如果让 <c>DataType</c> 为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" />，并将空格字符用作分隔符，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have <c>DataType</c> be <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" /> and to have the character specified by the <c>OtherChar</c> argument be a delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 如果让 <c>DataType</c> 为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" />，并且将 <c>OtherChar</c> 参数指定的字符用作分隔符，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The delimiter character when <c>Other</c> is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 当 <c>Other</c> 为 <see langword="true" /> 时的分隔符字符。

trans-unit.source: If more than one character is specified, only the first character of the string is used; the remaining characters are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了多个字符，则只使用该字符串的第一个字符；忽略其余字符。

trans-unit.source: An array containing parse information for the individual columns of data.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，包含各个数据列的分析信息。

trans-unit.source: The interpretation depends on the value of <c>DataType</c>.
trans-unit.target: 解释取决于 <c>DataType</c> 的值。

trans-unit.source: When the data is delimited, this argument is an array of two-element arrays, with each two-element array specifying the conversion options for a particular column.
trans-unit.target: 当对数据进行分隔时，此参数是一个由两元素数组组成的数组，每个两元素数组都指定特定列的转换选项。

trans-unit.source: The first element is the column number (1-based), and the second element is one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType" /> constants specifying how the column is parsed.
trans-unit.target: 第一个元素是列号（从 1 开始），第二个元素是指定如何分析列的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType" /> 常量之一。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType" /> values:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType" /> 值之一：

trans-unit.source: You can use <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType.xlEMDFormat" /> only if Taiwanese language support is installed and selected.
trans-unit.target: 仅当已安装和选择繁体中文支持时，才会用到 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType.xlEMDFormat" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType.xlEMDFormat" /> specifies that Taiwanese era dates are being used.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType.xlEMDFormat" /> 指定要使用的繁体中文纪元日期。

trans-unit.source: The column specifiers can be in any order.
trans-unit.target: 列说明符可以采用任何顺序。

trans-unit.source: If a given column specifier is not present for a particular column in the input data, the column is parsed with the <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType.xlGeneralFormat" /> setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果对于输入数据中的特定列，给定的列说明符不存在，则用 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType.xlGeneralFormat" /> 设置对列进行分析。

trans-unit.source: If the source data has fixed-width columns, the first element of each two-element array specifies the starting character position in the column (as an integer; 0 (zero) is the first character).
trans-unit.target: 如果源数据具有固定宽度的列，则每个两元素数组中的第一个元素都指定该列中的起始字符位置（以整数形式指定；0（零）是第一个字符）。

trans-unit.source: The second element of the two-element array specifies the parse option for the column as a number from 1 through 9, as listed above.
trans-unit.target: 两元素数组的第二个元素将该列的分析选项指定为从 1 至 9 的数字，如上面列出的那样。

trans-unit.source: The decimal separator that Excel uses when recognizing numbers.
trans-unit.target: Excel 用于识别数字的小数点分隔符。

trans-unit.source: The default setting is the system setting.
trans-unit.target: 默认设置是系统设置。

trans-unit.source: The thousands separator that Excel uses when recognizing numbers.

trans-unit.source: The default setting is the system setting.

trans-unit.source: Numbers that begin with a minus character.

trans-unit.target: 获取从行 1 的顶部到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的上边缘之间的距离（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The distance, in points, from the top of row 1 to the top edge of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从行 1 的顶部到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的上边缘之间的距离（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The value is returned as a double.
trans-unit.target: 作为双精度返回的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Left%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Top%2A> properties to display the distance from the left edge of column A to the left edge of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>, and the distance from the top of row 1 to the top edge of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Left%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Top%2A>属性，以显示从列 A 到左边缘的左边缘的距离<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>，以及按自上而下的行 1 到上边缘的距离<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。

trans-unit.source: Promotes an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control in an outline (that is, decreases its outline level).
trans-unit.target: 提升大纲中的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件（即，降低其大纲级别）。

trans-unit.source: If the range is in a PivotTable report, this method ungroups the items contained in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的范围是数据透视表中，如果取消中包含的项<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控件。

trans-unit.source: Separates a merged area into individual cells.
trans-unit.target: 将一个合并区域分成多个单元格。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the row height of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control equals the standard height of the sheet.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的行高是否等于此表的标准高度。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row height of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control equals the standard height of the sheet; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的行高等于工作表的标准高度，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the column width of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control equals the standard width of the sheet.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的列宽是否等于此表的标准宽度。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the column width of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control equals the standard width of the sheet; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的列宽等于工作表的标准宽度，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Validation" /> 对象，该对象表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的数据验证。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Validation" /> object that represents data validation for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Validation" /> 对象，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的数据验证。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Validation%2A> property to display a validation error if fewer than three characters are entered into an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Validation%2A>属性显示验证错误，如果少于三个字符输入到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Value%2A> property can be used with the following optional parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Value%2A>属性可以用于以下可选参数。

trans-unit.source: If you specify the optional parameters, you must use the `set_Value` and `get_Value` accessors in Visual Basic and C#.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定可选的参数，则必须使用`set_Value`和`get_Value`Visual Basic 和 C# 中的访问器。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRangeValueDataType> values that specifies the data type of the range value.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定范围值数据类型的 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRangeValueDataType> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRangeValueDataType.xlRangeValueDefault>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRangeValueDataType.xlRangeValueDefault>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> 控件的值。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used only with the `set_Value` set accessor.
trans-unit.target: 此参数仅用于`set_Value`set 访问器。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Value%2A>属性具有和没有可选的参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet" /> that represents the worksheet containing the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.

trans-unit.source: The worksheet is a native Excel <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName>, not a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName> host item.
trans-unit.target: 工作表是本机 Excel <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName>，而不<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName>主机项。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.Worksheet%2A>属性来显示的名称的工作表包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Excel wraps the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 Microsoft Office Excel 是否对 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中的文本进行换行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Excel wraps the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Excel 对 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件中的文本进行换行，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Excel changes the row height of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> control, if necessary, to accommodate the text.
trans-unit.target: Excel 更改的行高度<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>控制，如有必要，以容纳文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XPath" /> that represents the XPath of the element mapped to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XPath" />，它表示映射到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的元素的 XPath。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XPath" /> that represents the XPath of the element mapped to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XPath" />，表示映射到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange" /> 控件的元素的 XPath。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.XPath%2A> property to remove the XPath of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> if the XPath is "/ns1:Customer/ns1:LastName".
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange.XPath%2A>要移除的 XPath 属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>如果 XPath 为"/ ns1:Customer / ns1:LastName"。

trans-unit.source: The example then displays the current XPath of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后显示当前的 XPath <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.XmlMappedRange> named `CustomerLastNameCell`.
